alert.note: Alert for Alger; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 4:20PM EDT until March 18 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow with occasional heavy snowfall expected. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, locally up to 10 inches. The heaviest snow will fall between 2 AM EDT tonight and noon EDT on Saturday. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, leading to blowing snow. Expect the strongest winds and most significant blowing snow to occur late Saturday morning through the afternoon. * WHERE...Alger, Luce and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become difficult in some areas, especially on Saturday. Patchy blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Highway M-28 between Munising and Harvey will become especially impacted by blowing snow and low visibility late Saturday morning through Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
